channel.title: 562 How do i make range hit higher! and also change the prices!
channel.description:
How would i make range hit higher?
Also for prices ive tried itemdefenitions.xml, prices, item.cfg, and all other files containg prices does it pull it off a website or something, how can i change it!

item.title: 562 How do i make range hit higher! and also change the prices!
item.dc:creator: @Im_Not_Beast Im Not Beast
item.description:
@Im_Not_Beast wrote:

master laake:

How would i make range hit higher?

You can go into your item.cfg and raise the stats for your different bows.

[quote=“master laake, post:1, topic:412391”]Also for prices ive tried itemdefenitions.xml, prices, item.cfg, and all other files containg prices
does it pull it off a website or something, how can i change it![/quote]

Go to prices.txt in your source folder and search for the item price you want to change and change it.

Don’t forget to compile.

Read full topic
item.source: 562 How do i make range hit higher! and also change the prices!
